products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Powerbeats 2 In-Ear Bluetooth Headphones - Blue
products.shortDescription: Get the freedom you need to work out wirelessly with these Beats Powerbeats 2 wireless earphones with Bluetooth. Dual-driver acoustics accompanied by a lightweight design means you'll get your groove on and hardly notice their presence.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Powerbeats 2 In-Ear Headphones - Black
products.shortDescription: Get the freedom you need to work out wirelessly with these Beats Powerbeats 2 wireless earphones with Bluetooth. Dual-driver acoustics accompanied by a lightweight design means you'll get your groove on and hardly notice their presence.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Solo 2 Bluetooth Wireless Headphones (MKLD2AM/A) - Gold
products.shortDescription: Enjoy an unforgettable listening experience with the Beats Solo2 wireless headphones. Bluetooth connectivity lets you wirelessly stream music from your iOS devices, and allows you to take hands-free calls with the built-in mic. Equipped with fine-tuned acoustics, these headphones also offer clarity, breadth, and balance for immersive and crisp audio.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Pill+ Bluetooth Wireless Speaker - Black
products.shortDescription: Bring the party with you wherever you go with this Beats Pill+ wireless speaker. Sporting built-in Bluetooth, it pairs easily with your enabled devices so you can enjoy crisp, room-filling sound and wireless convenience. A built-in speakerphone lets you make and take calls, while the downloadable Beat Pill+ app enhances your listening experience.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Studio Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphone - Black
products.shortDescription: The Beats Studio wireless on-ear headphones are enhanced with Bluetooth technology so you can ditch the cable clutter. Take calls, skip songs, and change the volume right from your headphones. Featuring Beats Acoustic Engine and DSP software for enhanced clarity, it's the same exciting Beats Studio headphones, now with the freedom that only wireless can deliver.

products.name: Monster ROC Sport SuperSlim In-Ear Sound Isolating Bluetooth Headphones - Black/Gold
products.shortDescription: Cut the cord and experience the same untethered freedom as Cristiano Ronaldo on the soccer pitch. These workout-ready ROC Sport SuperSlim in-ear headphones from Monster are from the soccer superstar's LIVE LIFE LOUD line, combining premium sound with a wireless Bluetooth design. Other features includes in-line controls, voice dialing, and more.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Beats Solo 2 On-Ear Headphones (900-00134-01) - Black
products.shortDescription: Feel the pulse of your music with the Beats Solo2 on-ear headphones. Boasting enhanced acoustics and a wider range of sound, these headphones produce crystal-clear audio with crisp highs and deep bass lows to really tune you into what you're listening to. The sleek, curved design reflects the good looks that Beats headphones are known for.

products.name: Monster ROC Black Platinum Over-Ear Sound Isolating Headphones - Black/Gold
products.shortDescription: Listen to your music with the same precision and accuracy of a Cristiano Ronaldo goal from 18 yards out. These ROC Black Platinum over-ear headphones from Monster are from the soccer superstar's LIVE LIFE LOUD line, combining premium sound with a bold and iconic look. Features includes swiveling cups, in-line controls, noise isolation, and much more.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Powerbeats 2 In-Ear Bluetooth Headphones - Black
products.shortDescription: Pump up your workouts with the great sound and reimagined design of Beats Powerbeats 2 wireless in-ear headphones. Inspired by basketball player LeBron James, these water-resistant headphones can endure even your most gruelling workouts. They're lightweight and comfortable to keep you going when you're breaking out a sweat.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre urBeats In-Ear Headphones with Mic (MHD02AM/A) - Matte Black
products.shortDescription: Attention music lovers : These Beats by Dr. Dre urBeats in-ear headphones are designed just for you. Sporting a lightweight and resilient design, they deliver crisp highs and deep bass that'll have you lost in your own little world of music in no time. Throw in a built-in mic and you've got hands-free calling on your Apple device.

products.name: Monster adidas Sport Adistar In-Ear Sound Isolating Wireless Headphones with Mic (MHADS-PIEBKBTWW)
products.shortDescription: Looking for a pair of headphones that offers superb sound without the hassle of dealing with cables? Look no further than these Monster adidas Sport Adistar headphones. Built-in Bluetooth lets you connect wirelessly to your MP3 player or smartphone, while its sweat-proof design means they're built to withstand even your most intense workouts.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Studio Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphone - Matte Black - Open Box

products.name: Monster Superstar Bluetooth Wireless Speaker - Black/Grey
products.shortDescription: Enjoy larger than life sound in this compact wireless speaker. The Monster SuperStar is equipped to deliver your music, movies, games, and even conference calls in crisp, clear audio comparable to a large speaker system. Paired with your smartphone, you'll hear phone calls as you've never heard before.

products.shortDescription: Enjoy exceptional sound quality with the urBeats headphones from Beats by Dr. Dre. Featuring an exclusive driver design, the headphones deliver deep bass, soaring highs, and ultra-clear midranges for an immersive listening experience. A built-in microphone lets you take hands-free calls, while its lightweight construction offers easy portability.

products.name: Beats by Dr. Dre Pill 2.0 Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Beats Studio Over-the-Ear Headphones
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your music without being tied down, whether it's in private or sharing a playlist with friends. The Beats by Dr. Dre Pill 2.0 portable speaker and Beats Studio over-the-ear headphones give you 2 ways listen to music and watch movies with striking sound quality. Lightweight and portable, they're easy to take anywhere and offer undeniable style.

products.name: Monster SuperStar Splashproof Bluetooth Wireless Speaker - Black/Green
products.shortDescription: Wherever you go, the Monster Superstar Bluetooth speaker wirelessly delivers your favourite music, movies, games, and conference calls with detail and power. The ultra-compact portable speaker is optimized for smartphones, tablets, laptops, and PCs. It's up up for any adventure thanks to its IPX-4 splash resistance.
